entry.title: when is a wolf not a wolf?
entry.summary:
Author: laynie_addi

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,131Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Stiles survives. He survives the murder of his childhood friend, ritual sacrifice, and being possessed by a demonic fox spirit. He survives his body being worn like a coat, his hands coated in the blood of countless innocent people. He survives being the reason the love of his best friends life is dead. And then what?Derek leaves. Scott spirals. His dad is busy cleaning up all the bodies and death and destruction that follows in Stiles's wake. He's got no one to turn to and no one in his corner.When is a wolf not a wolf? When it's a fox. When is Stiles not Stiles? When he's been left behind.or; what I wish had happened after the Nogitsune
